StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetRemovedPrograms]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramID int, @FiscalYear int, @NumberOfRemovedPrograms int OUTPUT AS
SELECT @NumberOfRemovedPrograms = COUNT(1) FROM PROGRAM P INNER JOIN PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA ON (P.PROGRAM_ID = PA.PROGRAM_ID AND P.PROGRAM_ID = @ProgramID) INNER JOIN REMOVED_PROGRAMS RP ON (RP.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = PA.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID) INNER JOIN PROGRAM_PERIOD PP ON (PA.PROGRAM_PERIOD_ID = PP.PROGRAM_PERIOD_ID AND PP.FY = @FiscalYear)
